document.heading: Banking Institutions Trust Investment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-187, the “Banking Institutions Trust Investment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-395, which was referred to the Committee on Education. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 7, 1992, and October 6, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 2, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-307 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-187 became effective on March 16, 1993.
